Title: Prohibits the mayor from residing in a rent stabilized apartment
Summary: Prohibits the mayor from residing in a rent stabilized apartment; authorizes a landlord of a rent stabilized accommodation to bring a special proceeding to evict the mayor.
LawCode: Add ยง5-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; add ยง235-k, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, and the real property law, in relation to establishing an annual income eligibility limit for certain elected officials residing in rent stabilized housing
